selectedRowInfo.sql: select ObjName, State, count(1) Count, MIN(CreateDate) MINCreateDate,MAX(CreateDate) MAXCreateDate, CASE State When -1 Then 'ERRORS' When 0 Then 'Not Applied' When 1 Then 'Applied' Else 'UNKNOWN' END StateName from iz_DataImport where ObjName=@ObjName /*and CreateDate between CONVERT(datetime,@CDATE+' 00:00:00') and CONVERT(datetime,@CDATE+' 23:59:59')*/ group by ObjName, State order by ObjName, State
